scripts.build: npm --prefix server ci && (npm --prefix server run build || echo no-build) && npm --prefix frontend ci --include=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r frontend/dist/. build/
scripts.build:server: npm --prefix server ci && (npm --prefix server run build || echo no-build)
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend ci --include=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build
